</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current scale of given map control.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlMapScale''' ctrl</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
